resources.string: FadCam is part of the FadSec Lab suite. For more information, visit: https://github.com/fadsec-lab

FadCam is an ad-free, open-source video recording app developed by Faded. It ensures user privacy by not collecting, tracking, or analyzing any data. Free to use and available only on the official GitHub repo.
Join community for help, sharing ideas, and future app updates
